title: Special cards
content:
Drawing a 7 from the deck means you can look at any one of your cards 
 Drawing an 8 means you can look at any one other player's card 
 Drawing a 9 means you can do a blind swap with any other player (your card for their card) 
 Drawing a 10 means you can do an open swap with any other player 
 *Note* you must discard the card before using it
